scripts.build:setup: echo 'Creating directory structure...' && mkdir -p dist/sqlite-otel/docs dist/sqlite-otel/site
scripts.build:copy-landing: echo 'Copying landing page...' && cp index.html dist/
scripts.build:copy-site: echo 'Copying static site from site/ to /sqlite-otel/...' && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/* dist/sqlite-otel/
scripts.build:copy-docs: echo 'Copying MkDocs to /sqlite-otel/docs/...' && cp -r sqlite-otel/docs/* dist/sqlite-otel/docs/ && echo 'Copying site assets for docs styling...' && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/css sqlite-otel/site/js sqlite-otel/site/assets dist/sqlite-otel/site/
scripts.build:sqlite-otel: echo 'Starting build...' && npm run build:clean && npm run build:setup && npm run build:copy-landing && npm run build:copy-site && npm run build:copy-docs && echo 'Build complete'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist
